26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_ltc_base.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:34 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31#include <subdev/fb.h>
32
33int
34nvkm_ltc_tags_alloc(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc, u32 n, struct nvkm_mm_node **pnode)
35{
36 int ret = nvkm_mm_head(&ltc->tags, 0, 1, n, n, 1, pnode);
37 if (ret)
38 *pnode = NULL;
39 return ret;
40}
41
42void
43nvkm_ltc_tags_free(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc, struct nvkm_mm_node **pnode)
44{
45 nvkm_mm_free(&ltc->tags, pnode);
46}
47
48void
49nvkm_ltc_tags_clear(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc, u32 first, u32 count)
50{
51 const u32 limit = first + count - 1;
52
53 BUG_ON((first > limit) || (limit >= ltc->num_tags));
54
55 mutex_lock(&ltc->subdev.mutex);
56 ltc->func->cbc_clear(ltc, first, limit);
57 ltc->func->cbc_wait(ltc);
58 mutex_unlock(&ltc->subdev.mutex);
59}
60
61int
62nvkm_ltc_zbc_color_get(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc, int index, const u32 color[4])
63{
64 memcpy(ltc->zbc_color[index], color, sizeof(ltc->zbc_color[index]));
65 ltc->func->zbc_clear_color(ltc, index, color);
66 return index;
67}
68
69int
70nvkm_ltc_zbc_depth_get(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc, int index, const u32 depth)
71{
72 ltc->zbc_depth[index] = depth;
73 ltc->func->zbc_clear_depth(ltc, index, depth);
74 return index;
75}
76
77void
78nvkm_ltc_invalidate(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc)
79{
80 if (ltc->func->invalidate)
81 ltc->func->invalidate(ltc);
82}
83
84void
85nvkm_ltc_flush(struct nvkm_ltc *ltc)
86{
87 if (ltc->func->flush)
88 ltc->func->flush(ltc);
89}
90
91static void
92nvkm_ltc_intr(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
93{
94 struct nvkm_ltc *ltc = nvkm_ltc(subdev);
95 ltc->func->intr(ltc);
96}
97
98static int
99nvkm_ltc_oneinit(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
100{
101 struct nvkm_ltc *ltc = nvkm_ltc(subdev);
102 return ltc->func->oneinit(ltc);
103}
104
105static int
106nvkm_ltc_init(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
107{
108 struct nvkm_ltc *ltc = nvkm_ltc(subdev);
109 int i;
110
111 for (i = ltc->zbc_min; i <= ltc->zbc_max; i++) {
112 ltc->func->zbc_clear_color(ltc, i, ltc->zbc_color[i]);
113 ltc->func->zbc_clear_depth(ltc, i, ltc->zbc_depth[i]);
114 }
115
116 ltc->func->init(ltc);
117 return 0;
118}
119
120static void *
121nvkm_ltc_dtor(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
122{
123 struct nvkm_ltc *ltc = nvkm_ltc(subdev);
124 struct nvkm_ram *ram = ltc->subdev.device->fb->ram;
125 nvkm_mm_fini(&ltc->tags);
126 if (ram)
127 nvkm_mm_free(&ram->vram, &ltc->tag_ram);
128 return ltc;
129}
130
131static const struct nvkm_subdev_func
132nvkm_ltc = {
133 .dtor = nvkm_ltc_dtor,
134 .oneinit = nvkm_ltc_oneinit,
135 .init = nvkm_ltc_init,
136 .intr = nvkm_ltc_intr,
137};
138
139int
140nvkm_ltc_new_(const struct nvkm_ltc_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
141 int index, struct nvkm_ltc **pltc)
142{
143 struct nvkm_ltc *ltc;
144
145 if (!(ltc = *pltc = kzalloc(sizeof(*ltc), GFP_KERNEL)))
146 return -ENOMEM;
147
148 nvkm_subdev_ctor(&nvkm_ltc, device, index, 0, &ltc->subdev);
149 ltc->func = func;
150 ltc->zbc_min = 1; /* reserve 0 for disabled */
151 ltc->zbc_max = min(func->zbc, NVKM_LTC_MAX_ZBC_CNT) - 1;
152 return 0;
153}
